content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. I see you need electrical work done. May I have your name, please?
Thanks, Mike! Could you please provide your address so we can confirm service availability?
Thank you for the address. Checking your location in our service area now.
Great news, Mike! You are within our service area. When would be an ideal time for our electrician to visit you?
I was thinking maybe this Thursday afternoon?
Let me check our schedule for Thursday afternoon.
We have availability Thursday afternoon, Mike. Shall I go ahead and book that appointment for you?
Actually, I found a cheaper competitor online and I’m going to try them. So I won’t need to schedule with you. Thanks anyway.
reason: Customer found a cheaper competitor and declined scheduling

content: I understand, Mike. Thank you for considering XYZ Home Services. If you need assistance in the future, please don’t hesitate to reach out. Have a great day!
reason: Customer found a cheaper competitor and declined scheduling
